name: Blockman 1989
description:
In trying times like these, the world needs a hero! 

-A CONTROLLER IS REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME!-

Blockman is back in an all new adventure! Return to the skies and take down a new threat and restore peace and order to the ski resort! Blockman 1989 is a direct sequel to the cult favorite, Blockman 1988. Play as John Q. Blockman - the 'Q' stands for 'Qube' - and take down a new terrorist threat that's cutting into his vacation. Buy upgrades and expand your arsenal, and get creative with your kills. Blockman 1989 is a platformer made for the retro enthusiast, with tight controls, and old-school game mechanics (with a modern twist). 

Blockman 1989 will be free for all, but any donations are appreciated. I hope you enjoy playing Blockman 1989 as much as I did making it. <3 i3
